availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Ford (Owen County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary J. Yancey Ford in Owen County, Kentucky, on February 2, 1860. Father of Jennie L. Ford.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, New Liberty, p. 239B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272769, p. 129 (on microfilm), (accessed via Ancestry.com).
